page.title: 15Appleby Swimming Pool
page.content: The Swimming Pool was built in 1959. It was built as a memorial to the war. The Swimmimg Pool is open all through the week.There are two session there's a morning session which is open from 10:00 untill 12:00. The afternoon session is from 1:30 until 6:00.The afternoon session is the fun hour.The morning session is alway's very quiet.There are two boards,a spring board a medium board, and a slide. On Wednesday there is swimming club.It starts at 6:30 and finishes at 8:00.Mr Drummand and Mr Sampson run the swimming club.You can either be taught to swim or just play in the water.There are sometimes adults who come in the water and help you.Near the swimming pool there is a shop which sells hot and cold drinks.It also sells sweets,crisps & biscuits. Lyn Campbell
